I think it's a really good modernization of something very classic.
It's got a very alien feel to it...
...while being recognizable as the suit that we know and love.
I think it brings a sort of, almost like a testosterone energy to something,...
...which I think is required in today's movie world...
...because everyone is so used to things being so high-octane and visceral in the news.
Movies are fantasies that have to be even bigger and better...
...and I think the suit lends something of that to this.
It's something which is exceptionally cool and otherworldly at the same time.
